techmeme.title: The Connectivity Standards Alliance announces that Apple, Google, and Samsung will accept its Matter certification for their own "Works With" programs (Jennifer Pattison Tuohy/The Verge)
Meta elected three new directors to its board, including UFC CEO and outspoken Donald Trump supporter Dana White (Kurt Wagner/Bloomberg)
Fubo is expected to become immediately cash flow positive after its deal with Disney closes in 12 to 18 months; Fubo stock jumped 253.85% on Monday (Lillian Rizzo/CNBC)
Similarweb: DAUs of Bluesky's mobile app in the US grew 12% MoM in December vs. 284% in November; Bluesky has 26.44M total users, after hitting 20M in November (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
Dell is rebranding its PC lines as Dell, Dell Pro, and Dell Pro Max, each with Base, Plus, and Premium tiers, killing names like XPS, Inspiron, and Latitude (Antonio G. Di Benedetto/The Verge)
